ws
Class Tag

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ws.Tag
public class Tag
extends java.lang.Object

Class that represents a XML tag. It's used to decompose a string representing a tag in its name and attributes.

Field Summary
private  java.lang.String[] attribNames
          The names of the attributes of this tag.
private  java.lang.String[] attribValues
          The values of the attributes of this tag.
private  boolean empty
          Indicates whether the tag is an empty tag.
private  boolean finalizer
          Indicates whether this tag is a finalizer.
private  java.lang.String name
          The tag's name.
